response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. The product is worth an incredible $1,200,000 to you, and I am confident it will provide substantial benefits that align with your business goals.

I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This is a limited-time offer designed to reward early adopters and ensure you secure the best value for your investment. By taking advantage of this offer, you will not only save $100,000 but also gain access to exclusive support and resources tailored to maximize your success with the product.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am here to answer any questions you might have and guide you through the process of acquiring this exceptional product.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
